# "Stand Firm in the Storm"
## Scripture
"Put on the whole armor of God, that you may be able to stand against the schemes of the devil." â€“ Ephesians 6:11
## Reflection
As men, we often find ourselves facing storms in life that can be overwhelming and intimidating. It may be the pressure of work, the challenges of relationships, or the uncertainties of the future. In these moments, it's easy to feel like giving up or losing our footing. But as followers of Christ, we have a powerful tool to stand firm - the armor of God. This armor is not just a physical shield, but a spiritual one that protects us from the schemes of the devil. By putting on the whole armor of God, we can stand strong against the storms of life and emerge victorious. It's not about being perfect, but about being prepared and relying on God's strength.

## Daily Challenge
"Run 50 meters while declaring your trust in God's strength and protection."
